sentences.en: Don't do that or you'll get a smack.

sentences.en: I can't smack Randall: he is too big.
sentences.cn: 我不能拍兰得尔几巴掌,因为他太大了.

sentences.en: I think it's wrong to smack children.

sentences.en: Put that down or else I'll smack you.
sentences.cn: 把它放下,不然我就揍你.

sentences.en: Sometimes he just doesn't listen and I end up shouting at him or giving him a smack.
sentences.cn: 有时候,他就是不肯听话。闹到最后,我会冲他大声吼叫,或给他一巴掌。

the debate about whether parents should smack their children
sentences.cn: 有关父母该不该打孩子的辩论

sentences.en: The ice cream has a smack of chocolate.
sentences.cn: 这种冰淇淋有巧克力味道.

sentences.en: The meat had a smack of garlic.

sentences.cn: 他们的评论有点种族偏见的味道.

sentences.en: There is a smack of truth in his joke.
sentences.cn: 在他的玩笑中有一点真理.

sentences.en: There was a smack of exaggeration in his story.

sentences.cn: 这些举措带有绝望的色彩.
